DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate immunogenicity safety pertussis component DTwP ( whole-cell pertussis contain vaccine ) administer concomitantly RotaTeq™ Rotatrix™ .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Immunogenicity Safety Whole-Cell Pertussis Containing Vaccine Administered Concomitantly With RotaTeq™ ( V260 ) Rotarix™ ( V260-036 ) ( WITHDRAWN )
DOC.criteria: Healthy infant History abdominal disorder , intestinal folding , abdominal surgery Impaired immune system Prior administration rotavirus vaccine DTwP/DTaP Fever > = 38.1C ( 100.5F ) time vaccination History prior rotavirus infection , chronic diarrhea , failure thrive Evidence active gastrointestinal illness
